name: BlueKit Backend
description: Complete backend implementation for BlueKit Tauri application with IPC commands, file watching, and project management

tasks.description: Initialize Rust project with Tauri dependencies and configuration
Configure Tauri application settings, permissions, and build options
Implement main.rs entry point with Tauri builder and command registration
Create state management module for shared application state
Implement utility functions for cross-module use
Implement basic IPC commands (ping, app info, error handling)
Implement project-related commands (kits, registry, file reading)
Implement file watching commands for real-time updates
Implement file system watching with notify crate and Tauri events
